summary: A young couple takes in a mysterious foster child to raise on their farm. As the boy grows up to be a handsome young man, the husband starts to suspect his wife has feelings for him.
cast: Glen Powell|Bill Paxton|Luke Perry|Frances Fisher|Breann Johnson|Joelle Carter|Niki Koss|Cathy Diane Tomlin|Mallory O'Donoghue|Austin Harrod|Will Wallace|Lucas Adams|Aidan Alexander|Jaime Gallagher|Andrew Fognani|Hunter Wallace|Jeff Plunk|Meghan McGregor|Dylan Saccoccio|Sara Wallace|Lawrence Long|Brian Baldini|Kris Deskins|Megan Kiniry|Glenn Turney|Bob King|Loraelei Temoney|Tom Calococci|Dan Eggleston|Melanie Rashbaum|Lindsay Mabry|Jake McEntire|Nigel Walsh|Deprece Reddick|Sara Verner|Claire Proft|Ella Grace|Wilkins Wallace|Robert Johnson|Archer Atom AniAta|Susan Hamilton|Zach Kepple|Hugo J. title: Red Wing
